text: Reinaldo Paniagua-Diez (20 July 1934 – 29 January 2021) was a Puerto Rican politician and lawyer. He was the seventh Puerto Rico Secretary of State from 1977 to 1979. From 1985 to 1989, he was a member of the Senate. Paniagua Diez was a member of the New Progressive Party. He was born in Santurce, Puerto Rico. Paniagua Diez died on 29 January 2021 in Syracuse, New York at the age of 86.Fallece el expropietario de los Cangrejeros en el béisbol invernal, Reinaldo “Poto” Paniagua ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Secretaries of state of Puerto Rico Category:Puerto Rican lawyers
title: Reinaldo Paniagua Diez
